BULL CITY ROLLER DERBY SPONSORS


As a fully volunteer league, we are extremely grateful to the sponsors who make our training, travel, home bouts (July 2019!), and community involvement possible. Thanks to each of our sponsors for their support of inclusive athletic leadership in Durham.

Founding Sponsor

Honeygirl Meadery

General Sponsors

Sofia's Pizza

Gray Squirrel Coffee Co


Bruised Boutique

For information about how to become a BCRD sponsor, read the information below and email bullcityrollerderby@gmail.com.

BULL CITY ROLLER DERBY SPONSORSHIP OPPORTUNITIES


Explore BCRD sponsorship packages here.

To discuss the right sponsorship package for your organization, email bullcityrollerderby@gmail.com.


What will your sponsorship of Bull City Roller Derby fund?
  • Your gift will support inclusive athletic leadership in Durham.
  • Your gift will enable us to welcome new skaters with bi-annual “booty camp” recruitment events and available gear.
  • Your gift will help make uniforms accessible to all of our current and future teammates.
  • Your gift will subsidize our away travel adventures. With extra expenses of transportation, lodging, and meals, we need your support to take our Durham spirit out into the world.
  • Your gift will allow us to host public programs that promote inclusion and celebrate diversity in derby and the Durham community.
  • Your gift will provide us the opportunity to expand our youth engagement efforts throughout the community, with a focus on athletic leadership.
  • Your gift will help us start saving towards long-term league goals, including establishing a dedicated space for practice, scrimmages, and home bouts.

    • In recognition of unique financial barriers that may impact women, POC, and/or LGBTQ+ business owners, BCRD is committed to discussing flexible sponsorship package rates that allow everyone to support the athletic community we are building.

    BULL CITY ROLLER DERBY VOLUNTEERS

    Thank you to all of our amazing volunteers, for your support of BCRD!

    If you love the idea of being part of what makes BCRD incredible, if you want to meet new folx, or if you want to support inclusive athletics in Durham, this is your thing!

    Want to be a BCRD volunteer? Email bullcityrollerderby@gmail.com to learn more.
